an2.72:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two kinds of happiness. What two? Pleasurable happiness and the happiness of equanimity. These are the two kinds of happiness. Of these two kinds of happiness, the happiness of equanimity is foremost."[n.304]Mp. "Pleasurable happiness(sﾄ》asukha)is the happiness of the first three jhﾄ］as. The happiness of equanimity(upekkhﾄ《ukha)is the happiness of the fourth jhﾄ］a."
